docs.lead_paragraph: LONGEVITY does not come of its own accord. It must be cultivated. To go far along the road of life, there must be, at times, a moderation of pace. The Marathon runner proceeds more slowly than the sprinter, but he goes further.

headline.main: HOW TO LIVE LONG -- BY THOSE WHO KNOW

docs.snippet: LONGEVITY does not come of its own accord. It must be cultivated. To go far along the road of life, there must be, at times, a moderation of pace. The Marathon runner proceeds more slowly than the sprinter, but he goes further.

docs.lead_paragraph: WHITE PLAINS, July 7. -- Clarence O. Baring, accused of attempting to murder his wife, Mrs. Sally Griffiths Baring with arsenic and disease germs, was adjudged insane today and committed to the Asylum for Criminal Insane at Matteawan by Westchester County Judge William F. Bleakley.

headline.main: BARING FOUND INSANE BY STATE ALIENISTS; Man Accused of Trying to Kill His Wife With Germs Goes to Matteawan Today.

docs.abstract: C O Baring, on trial for attempting to poison wife with arsenic and disease germs, adjudged insane by alienists
